default..button--primary: background: #00703c;color: #fff;font: 300 19px / 25px "GDS Transport Website",arial,sans-serif;flex-direction: column;justify-content: center;align-items: center;padding: 8px 12px 7px;display: flex;position: absolute;inset: 23px auto auto 17px;box-shadow: inset 0 -2px #002d18;
default..button--secondary: background: #f3f2f1;color: #0b0c0c;font: 300 19px / 25px "GDS Transport Website",arial,sans-serif;flex-direction: row;justify-content: center;align-items: center;padding: 8px 12px 7px;display: flex;position: absolute;inset: 23px auto auto 124px;box-shadow: inset 0 -2px #929191;
default..button--warning: background: #d4351c;color: #fff;font: 300 19px / 25px "GDS Transport Website",arial,sans-serif;flex-direction: row;justify-content: center;align-items: center;padding: 8px 12px 7px;display: flex;position: absolute;inset: 23px auto auto 231px;box-shadow: inset 0 -2px #55150b;
default..button--start: background: #00703c;flex-direction: row;justify-content: center;align-items: center;gap: 10px;padding: 7px 12px 6px;display: flex;position: absolute;inset: 20px auto auto 338px;box-shadow: inset 0 -2px #002d18;
default..button--primary:hover: background: #005a30;color: #fff;font: 300 19px / 25px "GDS Transport Website",arial,sans-serif;flex-direction: column;justify-content: center;align-items: center;padding: 8px 12px 7px;display: flex;position: absolute;inset: 93px auto auto 17px;box-shadow: inset 0 -2px #002d18;
